high_Fasting_Glucose: Elevated fasting glucose suggests diabetes risk. Monitor A1C, low-carb diet.
low_Hemoglobin: Low hemoglobin may indicate anemia. Iron supplements, investigate causes.
high_Total_Cholesterol: High cholesterol increases CVD risk. Statins, heart-healthy diet.
high_Serum_Creatinine: Elevated creatinine signals kidney issues. Hydrate, nephrologist consult.
high_ALT: Elevated ALT indicates liver stress. Avoid alcohol, ultrasound.
high_TSH: High TSH suggests hypothyroidism. Endocrinology referral.
high_Systolic_BP: Hypertension risk. Lifestyle mods, BP monitor.
high_WBC: Elevated WBC may indicate infection. CBC follow-up.
high_Ferritin: Iron overload possible. Avoid iron supps.
